companies.name: Kippen Concrete
companies.summary: Concrete cutting and coring business in Utah. Profitable core business with 30-35 employees generating ~$5M gross revenue. Jarrad's primary cash cow that funds other ventures.

companies.name: Kippen Excavation
companies.summary: Excavation business with ~8 employees generating ~$2M gross revenue. Profitable. Pursuing land development / IOS yard opportunities.
keyFacts: First IOS yard under contract: West Haven, UT @ $280K, closing end of Feb 2026

companies.name: Dmi Tools
companies.summary: Diamond tool distribution business. ~$946K true 2025 revenue (not $1.5M — $570K was double-counted intercompany). Currently losing money (-7.6% margin), being subsidized by profitable businesses. 3 ne
keyFacts: True 2025 revenue: $946K (not $1.5M — $570K was intercompany transfers double-counted)

companies.name: Roc Diamond
companies.summary: Jarrad's personal holding company for legacy debt from original diamond tool business.
keyFacts: Roc Diamond LLC is Jarrad's personal holding company for debt from original diamond tool business
Holds ~$1.2M in debt: EIDL loan + Zions Bank equipment loan
DMI Tools Corp services this debt via lease payments to Roc Diamond
Will persist as debt-holding entity after DMI restructuring (DMI Tools LLC dissolved, ops move to DMI Tools Corp)
CRITICAL: Must combine ROC Diamond + DMI Tools financials to get true picture of DMI business health
